name: Eternal Genealogy demo version
description:
by Adrian Uson

Language:  
Tagalog and english

Genre: 
RPG

Features:
Turn-based system battle
No random battles

Platform:
Windows

Plot:
3 students
2 worlds 
1 crisis
Join our heroes as the meet new friends, uncover their fate, and discover their Genealogy

Gameplay length:
More than 30mins. 

Credits:
Giant Snake sprite - Avery's MV resources
Ship Graphic - Avery's MV resources
Train Graphic - hian

Candy Powder Cafe - Project Candy Powder by Biensoft works

Additional comments:
This is the first game I ever created so expect a lot of typos 
and I'm open for your comments, feedbacks and suggestions

How to play:
Open Eternal Genealogy.exe 
Extract the files wherever you want
Open Eternal Genealogy folder
Open the "Game"

Controls:

↓ - Down
→ - Right
← - Left
↑  - Up

Enter/Z - Confirm
X - Open Menu / Cancel
Shift - Run

Facebook Page:
https://www.Facebook.com/EternalGenealogyOfficial
